detail_desc: Top in slub cotton jersey with visible seams. V-neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and raw edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and side pockets.
Sleeveless, one-shoulder blouse in a cotton weave with a double flounce at the top and one shoulder with a narrow adjustable shoulder strap. Elasticated seam at the waist with a wide flared peplum.

Slightly longer jacket in soft faux shearling with contrasting colour sections in woven fabric. High collar, a zip down the front, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs. Zipped chest pocket and diagonal welt front pockets. Unlined.
Wide, sleeveless, flared dress in a double layer of mesh with an opening and button at the back of the neck, seam at the hips and a wide, gathered flounce. Lined.
Tunic in a viscose weave with a small stand-up collar, button placket and gathered yoke. Long balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a detachable tie belt at the waist, and a rounded hem.
Fully lined cotton corduroy trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and a back pocket. Jersey lining.
High-waisted, crêpe trousers with a zip in one side and slim legs with sewn-in creases at the front and a flare to the hem.
Short-sleeved sports top in airy, organic cotton jersey with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Trousers in cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, fly with a button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Pearly plastic bead stud earrings. Size from 0.2 cm to 1.2 cm.

Fully lined swimsuit with a V-neck at the back, a small opening with ties at the front and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and flounce trims at the top and around the legs.
Jersey leggings with an elasticated waist and pin-tucks on the legs.

Padded jacket in a quilted weave. Detachable, padded hood with a soft pile lining, and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Flap patch front pockets with a hook and loop fastening, and press-studs at the sides of the hem. Pile lining.
Calf-length trousers in a patterned viscose weave with a sheen. High waist, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, zip fly, side pockets and straight, wide legs with creases.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details, a high waist, button fly and slim legs with raw-edge hems.
Fully lined swimsuit with a V-neck and decorative knot detail at the front, low-cut back and narrow adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey with a square neckline and wide shoulder straps.
Wrapover bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves and press-studs at the side and crotch.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hi-tops in imitation leather and mesh with a padded shaft, adjustable hook and loop tab, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Shirt in cotton twill with a button-down collar with concealed buttons, a classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Sleeveless dress in a patterned cotton weave with buttons at the back, a seam at the top with a sewn-on bow and a flared skirt. Lined at the top.
Waist bag with a zip at the top, a zipped outer compartment and an adjustable strap with a plastic fastener. Lined. Size 6x13x19 cm.
Short dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the top. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Hat in fine-knit cotton with a faux fur pompom on the top and earflaps with narrow ties.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and zip down the front. Concealed, zipped pockets in the side seams, and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined. Filling 80% down, 20% feathers.

Trousers in soft washed cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, fake fly with a button, zipped side pockets, welt back pockets and slim, shaped legs with stitching on the knees and elasticated hems.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Suede trainers with a lightly padded edge and tongue, zip at the front and loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles. Sole 3.5 cm.
T-shirt in soft slub cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace and microfibre with mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Calf-length skirt in a pleated weave with an elasticated waist and raw-edge hem. Lined.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with ventilating mesh sections. Wide waistband with a concealed key pocket. The polyester content of the tights is recycled.

Knee-length dress in airy, patterned viscose jersey with a collar, V-neck, buttons at the top and short sleeves. Seam at the waist that is elasticated at the back, a tie belt and decorative buttons down the skirt. Unlined.
Treggings in stretch corduroy with an adjustable elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Airy chiffon blouse with a slightly wider neckline and 3/4-length sleeves with flounced cuffs. Partly lined.

Knee-length dress in an airy weave with a V-neck, gathered yoke and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Elasticated seam and a detachable belt with sparkly stone decorations under the bust. Partly lined.
5-pocket jeans in washed sturdy cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and straight, wide legs.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Bucket hat in cotton twill. Lined. Width of brim approx. 5 cm.
CONSCIOUS Joggers in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Hat in a soft rib knit. Turn-up at the hem with a small appliqué.
Short lace dress with short lace sleeves, a seam at the waist and flared skirt. Partly lined in jersey.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details. High waist and raw-edge, cut-off hems. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Wide polo-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Slightly wider leather belt with an antiqued metal buckle. Width 4 cm.
Dress in soft, crinkled jersey with an opening and button at the back of the neck, short butterfly sleeves, and a seam at the top.
Fitted top in a rib knit with a wide V-neck front and back and long raglan sleeves.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long raglan sleeves, buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sandals in imitation leather with an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Leggings in sturdy jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist and a glitter print.
Socks in a soft fine-knit with elasticated tops.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, concealed zip in one side, fake back pockets and tapered legs with slits at the hems.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend containing some wool with a stand-up collar, decorative buttons on one shoulder and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Round-necked top in soft cotton jersey. Short balloon sleeves in woven fabric with a jersey lining and concealed elastication at the hems for added volume.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft knit with a sewn-on extended hem in woven fabric with fake buttons, and wide ribbing at the cuffs.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.
Shirt in cotton-blend poplin with a collar and buttons down the front. Double-layered yoke and pleating at the back and long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. Rounded and longer at the back.
Round-necked T-shirt in slub jersey made from organic cotton with short sleeves and an open chest pocket.
Short-sleeved, embroidered jersey top.
Wide jersey top in a burnout-patterned cotton blend with a deep neckline at the front, short raglan sleeves, visible seams and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Ankle-length trousers in soft, airy viscose twill with a high, elasticated, drawstring waist, patch front pockets and elasticated hems.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a lace trim at the top, low waist, ties at the sides and gathers at the back.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Collar in woven fabric made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend containing glittery metallic threads. Long strips of laser-cut velvet discs front and back, padded shoulder sections and a concealed zip at the back. The velvet is made from recycled polyester.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly with buttons, side pockets, a back pocket and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Narrow belt in braided imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width approx. 1.5 cm.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in an airy weave. High waist with covered elastication. Lined.
Treggings in stretch denim-look jersey with a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Soft, non-wired bra in microfibre and lace with adjustable shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Wide blouse in a viscose weave with a wide neckline with smocking at the top. Long raglan sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fastening, and regular waist with concealed elastication. Side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs.
Shopper in grained imitation leather with imitation suede inside and two handles at the top. Unlined. Size 16x28x38 cm.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a lined front, racer back with sections in ventilating mesh and a wide elastic hem. Medium support.
Jumper in a textured pima cotton knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Shirt in a cotton and viscose poplin weave with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and frill trim around the neckline.
